an7.56:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate.
an7.56:1.3: Atha kho dve devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam gijjhakutam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu. Ekamantam thita kho eka devata bhagavantam etadavoca:
an7.56:1.9: Atha kho ta devata “samanunno sattha”ti bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayimsu.
an7.56:2.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa rattiya accayena bhikkhu amantesi:
an7.56:2.2: “imam, bhikkhave, rattim dve devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam gijjhakutam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu. Ekamantam thita kho, bhikkhave, eka devata mam etadavoca:
an7.56:2.7: Idam vatva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayimsu”ti.
an7.56:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma mahamoggallano bhagavato avidure nisinno hoti.
an7.56:3.5: Tena kho pana samayena tisso nama bhikkhu adhunakalankato annataram brahmalokam upapanno hoti.
an7.56:4.1: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evamevam—gijjhakute pabbate antarahito tasmim brahmaloke paturahosi.
an7.56:4.2: Addasa kho tisso brahma ayasmantam mahamoggallanam duratova agacchantam.
an7.56:4.6: Cirassam kho, marisa moggallana, imam pariyayamakasi, yadidam idhagamanaya.
an7.56:4.8: Nisidi kho ayasma mahamoggallano pannatte asane.
an7.56:4.9: Tissopi kho brahma ayasmantam mahamoggallanam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
an7.56:4.10: Ekamantam nisinnam kho tissam brahmanam ayasma mahamoggallano etadavoca:
an7.56:4.11: “katamesanam kho, tissa, devanam evam nanam hoti:
an7.56:4.13: “Brahmakayikanam kho, marisa moggallana, devanam evam nanam hoti:
an7.56:5.1: “Sabbesanneva kho, tissa, brahmakayikanam devanam evam nanam hoti:
an7.56:5.3: “Na kho, marisa moggallana, sabbesam brahmakayikanam devanam evam nanam hoti:
an7.56:6.1: Ye kho te, marisa moggallana, brahmakayika deva brahmena ayuna santuttha brahmena vannena brahmena sukhena brahmena yasena brahmena adhipateyyena santuttha, te uttari nissaranam yathabhutam nappajananti.
an7.56:6.4: Ye ca kho te, marisa moggallana, brahmakayika deva brahmena ayuna asantuttha, brahmena vannena brahmena sukhena brahmena yasena brahmena adhipateyyena asantuttha, te ca uttari nissaranam yathabhutam pajananti.
an7.56:7.1: Idha, marisa moggallana, bhikkhu ubhatobhagavimutto hoti.
an7.56:7.4: Yavassa kayo thassati tava nam dakkhanti devamanussa.
an7.56:7.5: Kayassa bheda na nam dakkhanti devamanussa’ti.
an7.56:7.6: Evampi kho, marisa moggallana, tesam devanam nanam hoti:
an7.56:8.1: Idha pana, marisa moggallana, bhikkhu pannavimutto hoti.
an7.56:8.4: Yavassa kayo thassati tava nam dakkhanti devamanussa.
an7.56:8.5: Kayassa bheda na nam dakkhanti devamanussa’ti.
an7.56:8.6: Evampi kho, marisa moggallana, tesam devanam nanam hoti:
an7.56:9.1: Idha pana, marisa moggallana, bhikkhu kayasakkhi hoti.
an7.56:9.4: Appeva nama ayamayasma anulomikani senasanani patisevamano kalyanamitte bhajamano indriyani samannanayamano—
an7.56:9.5: yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyya’ti.
an7.56:9.6: Evampi kho, marisa moggallana, tesam devanam nanam hoti:
an7.56:10.1: Idha pana, marisa moggallana, bhikkhu ditthippatto hoti …pe…
an7.56:10.6: Appeva nama ayamayasma anulomikani senasanani patisevamano kalyanamitte bhajamano indriyani samannanayamano—
an7.56:10.7: yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyya’ti.
an7.56:10.8: Evampi kho, marisa moggallana, tesam devanam nanam hoti:
an7.56:11.1: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano tissassa brahmuno bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evamevam—brahmaloke antarahito gijjhakute pabbate paturahosi.
an7.56:11.2: Atha kho ayasma mahamoggallano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
an7.56:11.3: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma mahamoggallano yavatako ahosi tissena brahmuna saddhim kathasallapo tam sabbam bhagavato arocesi.
an7.56:12.1: “Na hi pana te, moggallana, tisso brahma sattamam animittaviharim puggalam deseti”.
an7.56:12.3: Yam bhagava sattamam animittaviharim puggalam deseyya. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
an7.56:12.4: “Tena hi, moggallana, sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
an7.56:12.5: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma mahamoggallano bhagavato paccassosi.
an7.56:13.1: “Idha, moggallana, bhikkhu sabbanimittanam amanasikara animittam cetosamadhim upasampajja viharati.
an7.56:13.3: ‘ayam kho ayasma sabbanimittanam amanasikara animittam cetosamadhim upasampajja viharati.
an7.56:13.4: Appeva nama ayamayasma anulomikani senasanani patisevamano kalyanamitte bhajamano indriyani samannanayamano—
an7.56:13.5: yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihareyya’ti.
